DOC.brief_summary: To assess posterior capsule opacification (PCO) in patients implanted with either the AcrySof SN60AT lens or the AcrySof SN60WF lens.
DOC.brief_title: Posterior Capsule Opacification (PCO) Evaluation of the AcrySof SN60AT Lens vs. SN60WF Lens
DOC.criteria: patients with bilateral senile cataracts Age > 50 years Fit for hospital follow ups Pupils dilating > 6mm preoperatively Eyes expected to see 6/12 or better postoperatively Diabetes On treatment for glaucoma Other ocular pathology Previous ocular surgery
